body:
Also, I tried to reproduce this on my OS X machine and I can't even run the test. So something is odd.

```
$ go test
2015/11/30 14:36:09 executing go install -installsuffix=5577006791947779410 -buildmode=shared runtime sync/atomic failed exit status 1:
-buildmode=shared not supported on darwin/amd64
exit status 1
FAIL	_/Users/rsc/go/misc/cgo/testshared	0.122s
$ sw_vers
ProductName:	Mac OS X
ProductVersion:	10.10.5
BuildVersion:	14F1021
$
```
